com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk

Class BluetoothMesh

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk.BluetoothMesh

  • public abstract class BluetoothMesh
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a whole Bluetooth Mesh.

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(android.content.Context context,
                              BluetoothMeshConfiguration configuration)
                       throws com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk_low.ApiException
        Creates an instance of BluetoothMesh. Needs to be called before any call of getInstance() method.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the application.
        configuration - BluetoothMeshConfiguration used to initialize a BluetoothMesh instance.
        Throws:
        com.siliconlab.bluetoothmesh.adk_low.ApiException - Thrown when initialization fails.

        Returns:
        Instance of singleton BluetoothMesh.

      • getConnectableDeviceHelper

        public abstract ConnectableDeviceHelper getConnectableDeviceHelper()
        Returns:
        Connectable device helper applicable to this bluetooth mesh instance.

      • getNetwork

        public abstract Network getNetwork(java.util.UUID uuid)
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the wanted network.
        Returns:
        Network with given UUID.

      • getNetworks

        public abstract java.util.Set<Network> getNetworks()
        Returns:
        List of all networks in this bluetooth mesh.

      • createNetwork

        public abstract Network createNetwork(java.lang.String name)
                               throws NetworkCreationException
        Creates and add a new network to the bluetooth mesh.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of a new network.
        Returns:
        Object of a created network.
        Throws:
        NetworkCreationException - Thrown when creating network fails.

      • removeNetwork

        public abstract void removeNetwork(Network network)
                            throws NetworkDeletionException
        Removes a network from the bluetooth mesh.
        Parameters:
        network - Network to be deleted from the bluetooth mesh.
        Throws:
        NetworkDeletionException - Thrown when deleting a network fails.

      • clearDatabase

        public abstract void clearDatabase()
        Permanently removes a whole database of the bluetooth mesh. This does not affect the nodes.
